me madhya hamuwa pawul saukhya karyansha shrawanagaraye eeye (13) pawathwini.nirithadiga mosam wasi pawathina mayi saha juni masawalath, eesanadiga mosam wasi pawathina nowambar, desambar ha janawari masawalath samanyayen dengu roginge wadiwimak pennum karana bawada ki waidya thisera mahatha merata wartha wana samastha dengu rogin sankhyawen maranayata path wanne siyayata dashama hayaka sankhyawak bawada kiweya.pasugiya wasare wartha wu dengu roginge sankhyawa ha marana sankhyawa 2009 ha 2010 wasara dekata sapekshawa adu wimak pennum karana bawada waidyawaraya pawasiya. 2009 wasare rogin 35,000k ha marana 306kda, 2010 wasaredi rogin 34,000k ha marana 246kda wartha wu bawa ki ee mahatha 2011 wasaredi eya rogin 28,112k ha marana 185k lesa aduwi thibu bawada kiweya.rogaya kalin handunagena prathikara ganimen sankulatha ha marana sankhyawa awama kara gatha haki bawath, wisheshayen ma thaman jiwathwana pradeshaye dengu rogin siti nam unak walandunu wahama nisi prathikara laba ganima athyawashya bawath awadharanaya karini.wisheshayen dengu una walandunu wita asprin wani wedana nashaka aushadha pawichchi kirimen sankulatha mathu wiya haki bawath, una basa yamath samanga dengu rogaya ugra thaththwayata pathwime lakshana ismathu wiya haki bawin pahasukam sahitha rohalak wetha wahama rogiya yomu kirima wadagath bawath, mehidi awadharanaya karini..

shri lanka polisiye nawa godanagili idi kirime karyayan sandaha upadeshaka sewa aayathana path karaganima - (nyaya pathraye wishaya anka 38) nawa godanagili idi kirima, wadidiyunu kirima saha aluthwadiya kirima sadaha shri lanka polisiya wetha warshikawa rupiyal miliyana 1000kata wadi mudalak wen karanu labe. 2018 warshaye sita 2020 warshaya dakwa wana kala simawa thula shri lanka polisiye nawa godanagili idikirime wyapruthi sadaha upadeshaka sewa sapayime aayathanayak thora ganima pinisa rajya paripalana ha kalamanakarana amathya saha nithiya sa samaya pilibanda amathya ranjith maddumabandara mahatha idiripath kala yojanawak salakillata ganimin, injinerumaya karyayan pilibanda madhyama upadeshaka karyanshaya, rajya injineru sansthawa saha jathika godanagili departhamenthuwa yana aayathana wethin ema sewawan laba ganimata amathya mandalaya wisin anumathiya labadena ladi.
